prompt_template: Please assume the role of a {} year old survey respondent located in {}. We will be be asking you a series of questions, Please answer the survey questions in the provided format.

response_types.0: Please answer the question, and on the next line please give a numeric value between 1 to 10 rating your answer
response_types.1: Please answer in one word, followed by a numeric rating between 1 to 10 in the format [word: rating (numeric).
response_types.2: Please answer with a single, numeric value
